sentence.Network_en: He was made beholden to the Mafia.
She didn't like to be beholden to anyone.
I am greatly beholden to you for your kindness.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 右脑单词记忆 - 豆丁网 ... behold 目睹看见＋ beholden 表示感谢，欠人情的 belabor v. 喋喋不休地讨论，分析 【例】.
说话1_英语学习教室_新浪博客 ... acknowledge v. 致谢；承认 beholden adj. 感激某人的；欠人情的 grateful adj. 感激的.
2011年08月17日_jinggui_新浪博客 ... behold 见到 beholden 蒙恩的;负有义务的 beholder 旁观者.
gall的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... damsel 少女, 闺女... beholden 负有义务的, 受惠的... challenger 挑战者.

list.abs: ...不会介入来影响。不过，还有一些存在体，并不受制于（ beholden to）阿努并且独立运作于阿努及其联盟之外，而我在这里所说的…
Respect the past but avoid being beholden to it ., 尊重过去 , 而应避免被人依赖它.
The mainstream left was beholden to its militants , union friends and class warriors ., 主流的左派依赖于好战者 , 盟友以及阶级战士.
we were much beholden to him for his kindness ., 我们对他的好意感激万分.
We are much beholden to you for your help ., 我们对于你的帮助深为感激.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : archaic past participle of behold,in the otherwise unrecorded sense 'bound'

entry.tran: 欠…人情的；受…恩惠的；对…负有义务的
entry.def: If you are beholden to someone, you are in debt to them in some way or you feel that you have a duty to them because they have helped you.

example.ex: He was made beholden to the Mafia...
We feel really beholden to them for what they've done.
example.tran: 对他们所做的一切，我们真是感激不尽。

means.word_mean: 1. under a moral obligation to someone

auth_sentence.content: We are not beholden to cars or trains or planes.
auth_sentence.res_content: We are not beholden to cars or trains or planes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We are not beholden to cars or trains or planes.

auth_sentence.content: Whoever saves a life...remains beholden to the person he saved.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whoever saves a life...remains beholden to the person he saved.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whoever saves a life...remains beholden to the person he saved.

auth_sentence.content: These pigs are beholden to nothin nbut the bottom line and their stockholders.
auth_sentence.res_content: These pigs are beholden to nothin nbut the bottom line and their stockholders.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: These pigs are beholden to nothin nbut the bottom line and their stockholders.
